info.title: Study Buddy Platform API
info.description: API for Study Buddy Platform - Connecting learners through shared courses, skills, and availability. Features include user authentication, profile management, course tracking, skill matching, and study buddy recommendations.

tags.name: Users
tags.description: 👤 User profile management and CRUD operations

tags.name: Search
tags.description: 🔍 Study buddy matching and search algorithms

tags.name: Courses
tags.description: 📚 Course management - Track user's enrolled courses

tags.name: User Skills
tags.description: 🔗 User-skill associations - Connect users with their skills

tags.name: Availability
tags.description: 📅 Availability management - Track user's available time slots

get.description: Find users with matching courses, skills, or availability

schema.description: Current user ID (to exclude from results)

parameters.description: Current user ID (to exclude from results)
parameters.name: user_id

get.description:
Intelligent matching algorithm that calculates compatibility based on multiple dimensions:
			
			**Scoring Components:**
			- Course Similarity (50%): Measures shared and complementary courses
			- Time Overlap (30%): Finds users with matching availability
			- Skill Similarity (20%): Identifies users with compatible skill sets
			- Social Balance: Encourages diverse recommendations
			
			**Returns:**
			- Top 10 matches ranked by compatibility score
			- Detailed explanations for each match
			- Individual component scores for transparency

schema.description: Current user ID (required for personalized matching)

parameters.description: Current user ID (required for personalized matching)
parameters.name: user_id

schema.description: Maximum number of results to return

parameters.description: Maximum number of results to return
parameters.name: limit

200.description: Successfully calculated matches with compatibility scores
